thread.title: Stan Crinis
thread.title_full: Hack Repair Website Security Services, USA, Call (619) 479-6637 | We Fix Hacked Websites reviewed by Stan Crinis

author: Stan Crinis
title: Stan Crinis
text:
Our web site was hacked and as a result taken down by our web hosting company to protect their other sites.
In a state of panic we contacted Hack Repair late on a Sunday night - to our relief, the phone was answered and the next morning (a Sunday) Jim and the team were able to get us back on line.
Sincere thanks to Jim and the team for providing us with exceptional service and taking our stress away!
